text:
@GOPLeader 108,000 Americans are dead
40,000,000 Americans unemployed.
Coronavirus still rising along with Covid deaths
Americans are protesting in the street for equal justice
Trump is hiding from the people in his bunker
THESE ARE THE REAL PROBLEMS KEV
YOU ARE ON THE WRONG SIDE OF THIS
